name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Direct income support to landholding farmer families across India.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance coverage for crop failure due to natural calamities.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Short-term credit for cultivation, post-harvest, and allied activities.
benefits: Loans up to ₹3 lakh at subsidized rates

name: Agricultural Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
description: Medium to long-term debt financing for post-harvest infrastructure.
benefits: 3% interest subvention on loans up to ₹2 crore

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: Promotes organic farming through cluster-based approach.

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides soil nutrient status and fertilizer recommendations.

name: PM Kisan Maan-Dhan Yojana
description: Pension scheme for small and marginal farmers.

name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: Increase production of rice, wheat, pulses, and coarse cereals.
benefits: Subsidies on seeds, equipment, and technology

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Supports state-specific agricultural development plans.

name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM)
description: Promotes farm mechanization through subsidies.
benefits: Up to 50% subsidy on farm machinery

name: National Beekeeping and Honey Mission (NBHM)
description: Promotes scientific beekeeping for income generation.

name: Micro Irrigation Fund (MIF)
description: Promotes drip and sprinkler irrigation systems.
benefits: Up to 55% subsidy on micro irrigation systems

name: PM Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Ensures water availability for farming (Har Khet Ko Paani).

name: e-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
description: Online trading platform for agricultural commodities.

name: Gramin Bhandaran Yojana
description: Construction of rural godowns for storage of agricultural produce.

name: Modified Interest Subvention Scheme (MISS)
description: Interest subsidy on short-term crop loans.

name: Formation of 10,000 FPOs
description: Forms Farmer Producer Organizations for collective bargaining.
benefits: Equity grant up to ₹15 lakh per FPO

name: National Mission on Oilseeds and Oil Palm (NMOOP)
description: Increase production of oilseeds and oil palm.
benefits: Subsidies on seeds, inputs, and planting material

name: National Horticulture Mission (NHM)
description: Promotes holistic growth of horticulture sector.
benefits: Subsidy on planting material and infrastructure

name: Dairy Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
description: Generates employment through dairy farming.

name: National Livestock Mission
description: Sustainable development of livestock sector.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana
description: Sustainable development of fisheries sector.

name: National Mission on Sustainable Agriculture
description: Promotes climate-resilient farming practices.
benefits: Soil health, water management, and crop diversification support

name: Agriculture Export Policy
description: Promotes agricultural exports and farmer income.
benefits: Infrastructure and logistics support for exports

name: PM-AASHA
description: Ensures MSP for farmers through Price Support Scheme.

name: Punjab Crop Diversification Scheme
description: Encourages diversification from paddy in Punjab.

name: Punjab Paani Bachao Paisa Kamao
description: Direct benefit transfer for electricity savings in agriculture.

name: Mera Paani Meri Virasat (Haryana)
description: Financial incentive for not growing paddy in dark zone areas.

name: Bhavantar Bhugtan Yojana (MP)
description: Price deficiency payment scheme in Madhya Pradesh.
benefits: Compensates difference between MSP and market price

name: YSR Rythu Bharosa (Andhra Pradesh)
description: Investment support for farmers in AP.

name: Rythu Bandhu (Telangana)
description: Investment support scheme for agriculture in Telangana.

name: KALIA (Odisha)
description: Krushak Assistance for Livelihood and Income Augmentation.

name: Mukhyamantri Kisan Sahay Yojana (Gujarat)
description: Crop loss compensation due to natural calamities.

name: Karnataka Raitha Siri
description: Organic farming support scheme in Karnataka.

name: TN UZHAVAR Pathukappu Thittam
description: Tamil Nadu farmer protection scheme.
benefits: Free crop insurance and input subsidies

name: UP Kisan Rin Mochan Yojana
description: Farm loan waiver scheme in Uttar Pradesh.

name: Rajasthan Mukhyamantri Kisan Mitra Urja Yojana
description: Subsidized electricity for agriculture in Rajasthan.

name: Bihar Diesel Anudan Yojana
description: Diesel subsidy for irrigation in Bihar.

name: Maharashtra Shetkari Sanman Yojana
description: Direct benefit transfer to farmers in Maharashtra.

name: West Bengal Krishak Bandhu
description: Financial support for farmers in West Bengal.

name: Chhattisgarh Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana
description: Input support for paddy producing farmers.

name: Jharkhand Mukhyamantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana
description: Financial assistance to small and marginal farmers.
benefits: ₹25,000/year for farmers with up to 5 acres

name: Kerala SUBHIKSHA KERALAM
description: Self-sufficiency mission for agricultural production in Kerala.
benefits: Subsidies for organic farming and crop diversification

name: Assam CM Samagra Gramya Unnayan Yojana
description: Holistic rural development scheme including agriculture.

name: National Bamboo Mission
description: Promotes bamboo cultivation for income generation.
benefits: Subsidies for bamboo plantation and processing

name: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay Sanrakshan Abhiyan
description: Procurement at MSP and price deficiency payments.
benefits: Ensures farmers get MSP or above for their produce

name: Neem Coated Urea Policy
description: Ensures slow release of nitrogen for better soil health.
benefits: Increased urea efficiency by up to 10%

name: Vivad Se Vishwas II (Farm Disputes)
description: Settlement of agricultural disputes and contractual issues.
benefits: Quick resolution of farm-related contractual disputes

name: Agri-Clinics and Agri-Business Centres (ACABC)
description: Supports agriculture graduates to set up agri ventures.

name: Venture Capital Assistance for Agri-Business
description: SFAC provides venture capital for agri-business startups.
benefits: Up to 26% of promoter's equity as soft loan
